message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $14,000. This is a great opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a price that is slightly above its value to you, ensuring a profitable transaction for both parties.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value this product, $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it. Let me know if you're open to this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In order to find a mutually beneficial solution, I would like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while being competitive with your offer.
